---
id: list-filters-for-entity-type
title: "List filters for entity type"
description: "Returns all filter definitions (facets) that can be applied when searching for the specified entity type. Each filter includes metadata such as the facet key, UI label, category, and filter control type. Combine this endpoint with [GET /api/v1.0/categories/of/filters](/docs/api/categories/list-filter-categories) to present filters grouped by category before constructing search payloads."
sidebar_label: "List filters for entity type"
hide_title: true

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List filters for entity type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all filter definitions (facets) that can be applied when searching for the specified entity type. Each filter includes metadata such as the facet key, UI label, category, and filter control type. Combine this endpoint with [GET /api/v1.0/categories/of/filters](/docs/api/categories/list-filter-categories) to present filters grouped by category before constructing search payloads.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"entityTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Entity type identifier for which to retrieve available filters. Tickets, assets, and other modules each expose unique IDs for their filter catalogs. Retrieve entity type identifiers from [GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings](/docs/api/sites/get-my-site-settings) by reading `Item.EntityTypes[].EntityTypeId`.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"888891ac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00003","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMySiteSettings","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings","responseField":"Item.EntityTypes[].EntityTypeId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

provided."},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Extended description of the filter."},"Recommended":{"type":"boolean","description":"True when the filter is highlighted in the UI as a recommended facet.","example":false},"PluralizeValues":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether value labels should be pluralized when multiple selections are made.","example":false},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the category the filter belongs to when categorized."},"Category":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Metadata that groups filters into logical buckets such as asset filters, location filters, and workflow filters.","properties":{"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Visibility scope for the filter category (for example, `Global` or the parent category when nested. control.","example":"daterange"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the filter type.","example":"Date range"},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional description of the filter type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter type was created.","example":"2019-01-20T06:22:02.46"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter type definition was last key."},"TargetFlags":{"type":"array","description":"Optional collection of flags describing additional targeting metadata for the filter.","items":{"type":"string"},"example":[]},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Scope for the filter definition (for example, `System` or `Global`).","example":"System"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the product or module that provides the returned when the facet loads selectable options.","example":3},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the entity type that this filter targets. When omitted, the filter may be used across multiple entity types."},"CacheAvailableSelectionsOnEdit":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the UI caches available selections when the filter is edited.","example":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter was created.","example":"2021-11-27T06:33:42.68"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter was last modified.","example":"2021-11-27T06:33:42.68"},"OriginId":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier of the upstream source record when synchronized from another system."},"OriginSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the upstream integration that provided the filter definition.","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"}},"required":["FilterId","IsDeleted","Key","Name","Scope"],"title":"FilterDefinition"},"description":"Collection of filter definitions including facet keys, categories, and filter types."}},"example":{"ItemCount":104,"Items":[{"FilterId":"bc0539f5-4b4f-ec11-9820-0003ffe402cf","IsDeleted":false,"Key":"customfielddatetime","Name":"Custom Fields - Date Time","Scope":"System"}],"Paging":{"TotalRows":104,"PageCount":1,"PageSize":250,"PageIndex":0},"StatusCode":200},"title":"FilterDefinitionListResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized – authentication required."},"403":{"description":"Forbidden – caller lacks permission to retrieve filters for the entity type."}}}
